text:
Matrix Vibes Minus the Magic, But Bloody Entertaining All the Same:


Blimey, Hypnotic had me proper gripped from the off, like a dodgy pint that sneaks up on you - echoing the mind-melting chases of The Matrix but without that Wachowski wizardry to truly elevate it.

Ben Affleck's grizzled copper is a right tormented soul, and Alice Braga brings a spark of saucy intrigue that keeps the pulse racing. Robert Rodriguez zips through this 93-minute lark at breakneck speed, no faffing about with drags, just snappy twists that had me second-guessing every shadow.

It's engaging as you like, a solid 7/10 for sheer escapism, though something's missing - that elusive spark to turn good into great - and the predictability nips at its heels despite the curveballs. Can't fathom the dismal ratings; perhaps the critics were hypnotised into gloom?

For a rainy eve's popcorn fodder, it's a cheeky winner that left me chuffed. Fancy a reality tweak? Dive in, lads.
That was so bad. I never watched anything so convoluted and muddled in my life. Do not dare watch it. It is bad with no redeeming feature.

Different concept of imagination- aka part of the matrix but a nice idea- you just have to run with it. Ben did a stellar job and Alice played her part well- guess Queen of the South has served her well. Decent weekend movie to watch )

The film starts with some great action, an interesting premise and a strong antagonist. That gets slowly diluted and replaced by a much weaker story as the film goes on. I will happily watch a lot of B movie sci-fi but this one was just a little too meh. It was fine but I won't rewatch it.

It was an okay movie. The story though is a little all over the place and I struggled to really feel anything for the characters. A okay movie to just switch off to and watch but not something I would watch again.
I hypnotized myself into giving this movie a rating of 5, after much deliberation with myself against giving it a 1 star :)

Enjoyed the first 2/3 rd of the film then the last 1/3 was meh. Was a lot of twists and was intriguing but lost interest the last 1/3 as felt like oh so we used the first 2/3 rd of the movie for this reveal oh ok kind of feeling.
Es algo aburrida y el giro de trama no termina de convencer sobre todo el final algo sin sentido el cual no termina de convencer.
A weak, badly thought through plot with an unintelligent and morally dubious finale. I didn’t hate it, but neither did I love it. And frankly I expected more.
Horrible acting but the story is good
Yeah the trailer looks like a cheap movie.. but it's actually make sense when you see the twist
the twist was nice.

Ciencia ficción pura y dura, del tipo que te encanta (como a mi) o la odias. Completamente diferente a todo lo que se puede haber contado antes y a la vez familiar en algunas formas. Hynotic nos cuenta una historia que parece inverosímil que resulte al principio pero lo hace y lo logra con un buen ritmo, giros inesperados en los lugares precisos, excelentes actuaciones, gran dirección, efectos visuales en la dosis justa y un poco de corazón. Destinada a ser un clásico de culto desde su concepción, habrá gente que la ame y que la desprecie pero esta claro que desapercibido no pasa para nadie que la vea.

I feel like I'm hypnotized because the movie leads the whole story with hypnosis. On second thought, it's brainwashing, not hypnosis. It's not fun because it's so complicated. It would have been nice to make it like "From Dusk till Dawn"
This movie definitely has a good twist to it you really got to pay attention to it to understand it. It’ll definitely be worth your while
wawwww amazing banget film nya

Interesting concept, some cool plottwists. But the characters felt superficial and unconvincing to me, no deeper layers of their personality were touched upon... Not much character development in general, plot felt pretty unconvincing, especially at the end.

There's gem of an interesting premise here, but the presentation just feels like every scene is "oops, everything you learned up to now is wrong, it's really like this..." I don't like when it seems like the rules are being made up anew in every scene. Maybe it would improve on rewatch, but I'm not interested enough to rewatch it.

🍀 3.6/10


Walmart incception. It takes a lot from its peers such as the matrix and inception, but it’s not able to hold up to those standards. but what you have is fairly entertaining enough for some. it’s just not really good for me. Still the posters kinda cool.
This wasn’t bad at all, interesting, good action movie, and Mr. Affleck brings a great performance.
